#  Company Overview 

[![Wear What You Want](/system/files-encrypted/nasdaq_kms/inline-images/240513_DXL_CLP_InvestorRelations_5807_M.jpg)](https://www.destinationxl.com/mens-big-and-tall-store)

Destination XL Group, Inc. is the largest integrated-commerce specialty retailer of Big + Tall men’s clothing and shoes, offering the most extensive assortment of brands and exclusive styles for Big + Tall men. DXL allows Big + Tall guys the freedom to choose their own style. It’s everything they’ve been searching for and, at DXL, they will find top designer brands in the sizes they need, as well as, stylish choices they won’t find anywhere else and, above all, clothes that actually fit them. The Wear What You Want℠ brand positioning encompasses DXL’s commitment to its guests by providing clothes that actually fit Big + Tall shoppers. DXL’s unparalleled fit expertise, combined with the broadest assortment of brands and style options, the highest standards of quality, and an experience like no other make up what DXL calls The DXL Factor, and they believe every Big + Tall man deserves to have it.

Subsidiaries of Destination XL Group, Inc. operate DXL Big + Tall retail and outlet stores and Casual Male XL retail and outlet stores throughout the United States, an e-commerce website, _[DXL.COM](https://www.dxl.com/)_ , and a mobile app which offer a multi-channel solution similar to the DXL store with the most extensive selection of online products available anywhere for Big + Tall men. The Company is headquartered in Canton, Massachusetts, and its common stock is listed on the Nasdaq Global Market under the symbol “DXLG.

![About us wear what you want](https://images.contentstack.io/v3/assets/blt58e3dfc8365d0ef2/blt6916499080dcb993/663a7448907afec766af71ba/240507_DXL_CLP_WWYW_AboutUs_4626_Phase1_D_Banner_V2.jpg?auto=webp)

# ABOUT US

# GIVING BIG + TALL GUYS WHAT THEY WANT. TO WEAR WHAT THEY WANT.

We get Big + Tall. It’s all we do. At DXL, Big and Tall is not a section — it’s 250+ stores nationwide, a comprehensive website and convenient mobile App. We offer a shopping experience like no other, allowing Big + Tall guys the freedom to choose what they want so they can wear what they want. It’s everything they’ve been searching for, and at DXL, they will find top designer brands in the sizes and fits they need, as well as having stylish choices they won’t find anywhere else.

### THE DXL FACTOR

Everyone has heard of the X Factor. Here, we call it The DXL Factor.

It’s the belief that a great wardrobe isn’t a privilege but a Big + Tall man’s right. It’s the freedom to choose from the largest assortment of the best brands and the most exclusive styles, and it’s the way we enable the Big + Tall guy to wear what he wants.

#### FIT

Working with Big + Tall guys for decades has taught us that we can’t just make clothes bigger, we have to make them differently. Our team has worked for decades to develop specific patterns, taking into consideration fit, comfort, movement and durability for sizes 1XL to 8XL and waists ranging from 38” to 70” to ensure a perfect fit.

#### QUALITY

Our clothes are not just built bigger, but built better with comfort + durability Big and Tall men can trust. Guests can breathe easier in stretch fabrics, hidden comfort features, reinforced seams, performance technology + so many more extras built in that he’ll appreciate.

#### ASSORTMENT OF BRANDS

With a broad, highly-curated, head-to-toe selection of over 5,000 styles, 100 brands across all price points, and exclusive offerings not available anywhere else, our guest has the largest selection of Big + Tall styles.

We truly want big and tall men to look and feel their best for every occasion. From exclusive brands and styles, the latest designers, like vineyard vines, Polo Ralph Lauren, Nautica, Reebok, Levi’s and many more, to everyday essentials and private labels like Harbor Bay, Synrgy, Oak Hill and True Nation that are not found anywhere else.

#### STYLE

Our wide selection allows our guests to show up in style every day…not just on the big days or special occasions. Big + Tall men can easily shop from classic styles to day-to-day essentials and fashionable on-trend looks from their favorite brands, all in one place.

#### EXPERIENCE

DXL associates are trained and certified Fit and Style Experts who welcome our guests, helping, guiding and establishing meaningful relationships with each customer, through respect, value and trust no matter how guests choose to shop – at DXL.COM, on our App or in-store.

## OUR MISSION

We exist to provide the Big + Tall man the freedom to choose his own style.

## OUR VISION

We relentlessly strive to serve the fit and style needs of the Big + Tall man so he can wear what he wants.

## GIVING BACK: CARE + COMPASSION IN THE DXL COMMUNITY

Our partnership with St. Jude Hospital is one our associates take to heart. During our 16+ years, we’ve raised over $16 million by participating in Thanks and Giving Campaign, The St. Jude Walk/Run to End Childhood Cancer, Round Up the Change and more. These efforts have allowed us to fund initiatives like the Light Microscopy Center. Our associates are also passionate about supporting our local communities like: Big Brothers Big Sisters – Clothing Drive; The Canton Food Pantry – Food Drive; St. Jude Spring Prom – Donate A Dress; Quincy Family Resource Center – Toy Drive and the DXL Volunteer Service Program – 1 Day Per year volunteering at a 501 (c)(3).
